Today I learned about TIL-style blogs

 · 12 Feb 2026

I’ve been wanting to create a blog-like personal page for a little time now. After discovering the blog of Simon Willison a few weeks ago, and later his post What to blog about, I’ve finally taken the step to try it out myself. Specifically, I will treat this little site as a Today I {verbed}-style blog. Replace verbed with words like learned (of course), created, went, lost, and found.

Of course, there have been other factors pushing me to finally getting started - my partner (rightfully) thinks that I should write my thoughts, ideas, and funky feelings down somewhere instead of sharing them nowhere. Thus, this place is meant as a personal collection of such. Mainly for my self - but open to the public.

As such, welcome to my blog.
